attributes.action: LEAVE THE UNITED STATES OF EUROPE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WE HAVE NO REAL HISTORICAL BASIS FOR EVER SIGNING UP TO A TREATY THAT INIALLY WAS BASE ON A OPEN MARKET TRADING AGREEMENT.

THE "ANIMAL" THAT THE EU HAS BECOME BEARS NO RELATION TO THAT WHICH THE UK ELECTORATE VOTED FOR IN THE 70'S.

THE WHOLE THING HAS BEEN A "CONSPIRACY" BY A BUNCH OF DEVIOUS, LYING POLITICIANS TO CONTROL THE AND MANIPULATE THE INDIGENOUS POPULATION OF THE UK INTO ACCEPTING A SET OF RULES, LAWS ETC THAT ARE SET BY FOREIGN POLITICIANS WHO HAVE NO COMPREHENSION WHATSOEVER OF THE STANDARDS, CULTURE ETC ETC OF THE UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
